title: Did he kill a former Russian lawman to testify against Paul Manafort in the treason trial?
subtitle: Untrustful sources claimed that Dennis Voroninkov, Vladimir Putin's critic who was shot dead in Ukraine in March 2017, was to testify against the former Trump campaign manager.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Russian dissident Denis Voroninkov, who was killed in March 2017, is scheduled to testify against former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort in a treason trial in Ukraine.
